# Gridstation

Templates used to make grid station images

Grid Station Settings

```csv
16 8 #bbbbbb #fcb400 #ffffff #000000 20 20 4 1 1
```

## Init View

```csv
6 10 0 6 0 6 6 0 6 0 6 0 15 2 2 2

6 0 6 0 6 0 6 10 0 6 0 6 5 6 7 8
10 0 6 0 6 6 0 6 0 6 0 6 1 2 3 4
```
